title: Request: Pluto Outline scan
content:
Hi,

Just wondering if anyone got a hi res scan of this? I want to use it for a project, but can't find a digital version. Only a non-outline version called "Lucifer" have been digitalised. Not sure why it's called that. Was there never a Pluto Regular?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417161149im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DanXSolo-PlutoOutline_4077.png)

cheers,

Pookey
author: pookeyblow

comments.content: Just compared Pluto Recreation with my old Letraset Catalog and it is a pretty good and clean job. Looking for a lowercase for you.

Have a 400 dpi at 4" x 32" from a Letraset catalog if you want it - email me - sample below

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417161149im_/http:/typophile.com/files/screenshot_01_3933.jpg)

"Not sure why it's called that."  
Pluto, Roman god of the underworld (afterlife), after Greek Hades. Lucifer, ruler of Christian Hell.
Thanks a lot for the link to the font! Exactly what I needed :)
